thread.title: JK Rowling play to feature adult Harry Potter, son Albus - Hampton Roads Daily Press
thread.title_full: JK Rowling play to feature adult Harry Potter, son Albus - Hampton Roads Daily Press - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Hampton Roads Daily Press
title: JK Rowling play to feature adult Harry Potter, son Albus - Hampton Roads Daily Press
text:
Producers announced Friday that "Harry Potter and the Cursed Child" will center on an adult Harry and his son Albus Severus. The two-part stage saga begins where Rowling's books ended - 19 years after the boy wizard's epic battle with evil Lord Voldemort.
 Hampton Roads Daily Press.
